name: Astronomy-test
short_description: For nearly a decade Skype and Telescope Magazine provided small BASIC programs demonstrating astronomy computing for educational and inspirational purpose. This project is an inspiration of those programs, using not only BASIC, but any programming language in which it may be fun using.
